IndexPage.about-desc: Hello, I'm Gerardo Llanos, a computer engineer and web developer with experience in building full-stack applications using technologies like ReactJS, Next.js, NodeJS, and MongoDB.

About.paragraph_one: I am Gerardo Llanos, a computer engineer graduated from Duoc UC in 2024. I specialize in web development using technologies such as React, Next.js, and Node.js.
About.paragraph_two: My main motivation is to develop applications that not only solve problems but also have a positive impact on the people who use them.
About.paragraph_three: I stand out for my ability to work under pressure and my creativity, which allowed me to achieve second place in the 2023 Duoc UC Hackathon, where I designed and developed effective solutions in record time.
About.paragraph_four: In my free time, I enjoy playing video games, practicing tennis, exploring new languages, and building the habit of reading. I am always looking for new challenges that allow me to grow professionally.
